Once the dough is ready, you'll dive into creating whimsical fillings, experimenting with traditional and imaginative ingredients sourced locally. But the fun doesn't stop there! You'll be encouraged to weave poetry into your patisserie process, penning verses inspired by your culinary creations. By the end of the class, participants will have mastered the art of both pasty-making and poetry, culminating in a tasting session where your culinary and literary masterpieces are shared and savored. Whether you're a budding chef or a poetic soul, this class promises a unique blend of tradition, creativity, and fun.

Professor Mossbottom, with his charming anecdotes and deep botanical knowledge, will ensure all participants gain a respect and understanding of the ecological role of these small yet mighty plants. Once your mossy treasures are collected, you'll return to the workshop base —a cozy, rustic lodge equipped with all necessary crafting stations. Join us for a day of creativity, nature, and a touch of enchantment in the heart of Scotland!

Learning Objectives: Learn the basics of hedgehog care and feeding. Understand the art of hedgehog habitats and environments. Master the gentle handling and health checks of hedgehogs. Throughout this immersive day-long class, participants will learn essential skills, starting with the basics of hedgehog nutrition and how to prepare a balanced diet of worms and berries. You'll be introduced to the enchanting world of hedgehog habitats, where you'll craft the perfect cozy environment to encourage their natural behaviors. Handling hedgehogs is an art, and Mr. Pricklesworth will guide you through the gentle techniques needed for health checks and fostering trust with these timid creatures. As you settle into the rhythm of hedgehog care, you'll find opportunities to practice mindfulness, observing their quirky antics as a meditative practice. Finally, delve into the rich folklore surrounding hedgehogs in Britain, learning tales that have been passed down through generations. By the end of the class, you'll leave with a newfound respect and affection for these nocturnal companions, along with practical skills to care for them in your own garden or hedgehog sanctuary.

Equipped with sky-gazing blankets and cloud journals, you'll sketch and document your observations while learning the science behind these fluffy masterpieces. Next, you'll delve into creative techniques for simulating cloud formation using natural elements. With portable sun reflectors, you’ll explore how light and shadow play across clouds, mastering the art of cloud shading to bring your ethereal creations to life. To add a sprinkle of whimsy, you'll engage in 'Fog-in-a-jar' activities, crafting mini-clouds to understand the fundamentals of weather patterns. Finally, unleash your creativity by weaving imaginative stories inspired by the shapes you see in the sky. Join us for a class that blends art, science, and storytelling, offering a unique perspective on the world above us. Reconnect with the sky, and let the clouds be your canvas!

This enchanting journey into the past will surely quill your thirst for heritage crafts!

Description: Step into the enchanting world of 'Magical Moss Mosaics' with the esteemed Professor Lichenbottom, where the serene beauty of nature meets creative expression. Hosted in the verdant heart of Edinburgh, this class is a delightfully whimsical foray into the art of crafting with moss. Students will embark on a botanical journey to learn about various moss species, understanding their unique textures and hues, and developing the skills to harvest them sustainably. Under Professor Lichenbottom's expert guidance, participants will create their own moss mosaics, transforming simple materials into vibrant, living artwork. The class will begin with a foraging session in a nearby woodland, where students will collect moss samples while learning about their ecological significance. Back in the cozy art studio, they will sketch their designs, incorporating elements of natural symmetry and balance. With the aid of eco-friendly adhesives and a selection of natural embellishments like pebbles and driftwood, participants will bring their mossy masterpieces to life, constructing intricately textured artworks that are as sustainable as they are beautiful. Throughout the session, students will also discover best practices for maintaining their creations, ensuring that their moss mosaics remain lush and lively. Perfect for nature enthusiasts and craft lovers alike, this class promises a uniquely enriching experience that combines artistic flair with environmental mindfulness.

Learning Objectives: Learn the basics of three-ball juggling. Understand the physics behind juggling patterns. Develop hand-eye coordination and dexterity. Explore creative ways to juggle everyday objects. Enhance concentration and focus through juggling
Provided Materials: Set of juggling balls. Guidebook: 'Jebediah's Joyful Juggling'. Juggling scarves. A special 'juggle bag' for practice. Access to online tutorials for continued learning.

Description: Welcome to 'Jolly Juggling with Jebediah Jellybean', a whimsical class designed to bring joy and giggles into your life while mastering the ancient art of juggling. Under the expert guidance of Jebediah Jellybean, a renowned juggling enthusiast with a penchant for eccentricity, you'll embark on a playful journey to learn the fundamentals of juggling. Students will begin with three-ball juggling, delving into the science of juggling patterns and the physics that make juggling not just an art, but a fascinating study of momentum and balance. As your skills develop, you'll explore creative ways to juggle everyday objects, such as fruit, socks, or even your car keys (only for the brave!). Jebediah will also impart his unique techniques for enhancing concentration and focus, teaching you how to juggle not just objects, but your thoughts and energy in a busy world. The class includes a set of professional juggling balls, a colorful guidebook filled with tips, juggling scarves for advanced practice, and a special 'juggle bag' to take home. With laughter guaranteed and skills to be gained, this class offers a delightful escape from the mundane, ensuring you leave with a smile and an impressive new party trick!

Learning Objectives: Understand the therapeutic benefits of bubbles for stress relief. Learn techniques for creating giant and long-lasting bubbles. Master the art of bubble choreography with whirligigs. Explore mindfulness through bubble-focused meditation. Develop a personal bubble-themed relaxation routine
Provided Materials: Giant bubble wands. Special bubble solution. Decorative whirligigs. Bubble-themed mindfulness journal. Bubble blower kit.
Skills Developed: Stress Relief, Mindfulness, Creativity, Relaxation Techniques, Self-Care
Description: Join us in the heart of York for 'Bubble Therapy & Whirligig Wind-down,' a delightfully effervescent class designed to melt away stress and rekindle your playful spirit. Led by the whimsical Dr. Bubbly Fizzlesworth, this session promises a journey into the tranquil yet bubbly realm of therapeutic bubble play. Participants will first delve into the art of crafting giant, mesmerizing bubbles using special wands and solution—a skill that combines physics with fun. You'll learn to create bubbles so large and resilient, they float gracefully across the sky. The class moves onto an exploration of bubble choreography, where bubbles and whirligigs dance in harmony. This unique practice merges mindfulness techniques with playful creativity, teaching you to choreograph intricate patterns that soothe the mind and uplift the spirit. Following the bubbly ballet, Dr. Fizzlesworth will guide you through a bubble-focused meditation, encouraging you to clear your mind as you watch bubbles drift and pop, finding peace in their ephemeral nature. Finally, students will craft personal, bubble- themed relaxation routines, integrating newfound skills into daily life to ensure joy continues to effervesce beyond the classroom. All materials, including a bubble blower kit and a mindfulness journal, are provided, ensuring you leave equipped to infuse a little whimsy into your wellness routine at home.
